title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize SQL Server & .NET Together with AWS Transform's New AI Agent (MAM340)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS Transform的新AI代理共同现代化SQL Server和.NET (MAM340)
abstract: Want to cut your Microsoft licensing costs by up to 70% while modernizing SQL Server workloads? Join us to explore AWS Transform's groundbreaking new capability that automates end-to-end migration from SQL Server to Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL. Learn how this powerful solution converts your entire SQL Server stack - from schemas and stored procedures to embedded logic - while accelerating modernization timelines by up to 5x. In this session, we'll demonstrate how AWS Transform helps you achieve enhanced security, performance, and scalability through purpose-built AWS services, revolutionizing your database modernization journey.
abstract_cn: 想要将 Microsoft 许可成本降低高达 70% 并同时实现 SQL Server 工作负载的现代化吗?加入我们,探索 AWS Transform 的突破性新功能,该功能可自动化完成从 SQL Server 到 Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL 的端到端迁移。了解这一强大解决方案如何转换您的整个 SQL Server 堆栈——从架构和存储过程到嵌入式逻辑——同时将现代化时间表加速高达 5 倍。在本次会议中,我们将演示 AWS Transform 如何通过专门构建的 AWS 服务帮助您实现增强的安全性、性能和可扩展性,彻底改变您的数据库现代化之旅。
